title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Update Payment Information
content:
Users can update their payment method from the app under 'My Account' > 'Billing & Payments'.

- Supports credit/debit cards and UPI
- Ensure the card has sufficient balance before updating
- If a payment fails, the system will retry automatically within 24 hours

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your payment method anytime by going to 'My Account' > 'Billing & Payments'. Just add a new card or UPI ID and save your changes."

title: What Happens If You Miss an Event
content:
If a user misses a reserved event:

- The reservation counts toward their monthly quota
- Premium or paid events are non-refundable
- Encourage users to cancel early if they can’t attend

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If you miss an event, it will still count toward your monthly experiences. To avoid this, be sure to cancel ahead of time if you can’t make it."

title: How to Change Email or Phone Number
content:
Users can update their contact details under 'My Account' > 'Profile'.

- A verification OTP will be sent to the new phone number
- Changing email requires reconfirmation through a verification link

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your email or phone number under the 'Profile' section. We’ll send a quick verification to confirm the update."

title: How to View Past Experiences
content:
Users can view their previous reservations in the 'History' tab of the app.

- Shows attended and missed events
- Useful for tracking preferences and recommendations

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can see all your past experiences in the 'History' section. It shows what you’ve attended and what you’ve reserved previously."

title: Support for Accessibility Requests
content:
Some events provide accessibility accommodations.

- In the event description, look for 'Accessibility Available'
- For specific needs, users can contact support via in-app chat

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Many experiences offer accessibility support. Check the event details for the 'Accessibility Available' tag or contact us if you need specific assistance."

title: How to Update App Notifications
content:
Notification preferences can be adjusted under 'Settings' > 'Notifications'.

- Users can toggle reminders, new event alerts, and subscription updates

**Suggested phrasing:**
"To manage notifications, go to 'Settings' > 'Notifications' and choose what you'd like to receive."

title: Why an Experience Shows as 'Sold Out'
content:
If an event appears sold out:

- All reservation slots have been taken
- Premium events often fill up first
- Encourage users to check again later as slots may reopen on cancellations

**Suggested phrasing:**
"This event is currently sold out because all slots are booked. You can check back later—sometimes slots reopen if another user cancels."

title: How Age Restrictions Work for Events
content:
Certain experiences have age guidelines for safety or content.

- Age limits are shown clearly in event descriptions
- Reservation will be blocked if the user does not meet requirements

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Some events have age restrictions for safety reasons. You’ll see these in the event description before reserving."

title: How to Report an Issue With an Experience
content:
Users can report issues directly via the 'Help & Support' option.

- Provide event name, date, and reservation ID
- For serious issues, escalate to human support immediately

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If something didn’t go as expected, you can report it through 'Help & Support'. Please share the event name and reservation ID so we can assist quickly."

title: How to Gift a CultPass Subscription
content:
Users can purchase a gift subscription from the website or app.

- Choose duration (1, 3, or 6 months)
- Recipient receives activation link via email
- Gifted plans are non-refundable

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can gift a CultPass by selecting the 'Gift a Subscription' option. The recipient will get an email with instructions to activate it."
